content: For release on delivery   1:45 p.m. EDT   March 23, 2012            Opening Remarks    by    Ben S. Bernanke    Chairman    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System    at    “Central Banking:  Before, During, and After the Crisis”    A Conference Sponsored by the    Federal Reserve Board and the International Journal of Central Banking    Washington, D.C.          March 23, 2012
